## VM.sendKeyDownEvent() method

Sends a keydown event to the virtual machine.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
sendKeyDownEvent(key: Key | string): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  key | [Key](./vm-providers.key.md) \| string | specifies which key to press |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;
